name: Pikachu
description: Pikachu is a yellow mouse Pokémon, the mascot of Pokémon and has become an icon of Japanese culture in recent years.

name: Bulbasaur
description: Bulbasaur is a small, quadrupedal Pokémon that has blue-green skin with darker patches.

name: Squirtle
description: Squirtle is a small Pokémon that resembles a light-blue turtle.

name: Charmander
description: Charmander is a bipedal, reptilian Pokémon with a primarily orange body and blue eyes.

name: Charizard
description: Pokemon "Charizard" have height 170 cm & Weight 90.5 kg with type Fire and Flying.

name: Caterpie
description: Pokemon "Caterpie" have height 30 cm & Weight 2.9 kg with type Bug.

name: Butterfree
description: Pokemon "Butterfree" have height 109 cm & Weight 3.2 kg with type Bug and Flying.

name: Beedrill
description: Pokemon "Beedrill" have height 99 cm & Weight 2.95 kg with type Bug and Poison.

name: Pidgeot
description: Pokemon "Pidgeot" have height 150 cm & Weight 3.95 kg with type Normal and Flying.
